name: fraction (basementbuilt)
description:
Fraction is a turn based RPG with a lot of focus on a limited inventory. Part of the strategy is to choose what to keep and what to use and throw away.

Your stash is kept between runs.

Very early PROTOTYPE! Nothing might work

Config, (for now) in-game menu incoming: Start game once and then edit config.json:

"conf": { "mousescroll": true, //if you want to mouse edge scroll map "musicVol": 40, //music volume "vsync": false, //turn off! "w": 1920, //render w "h": 1080, //render h "renderGrass": true, //turn off if bad FPS "renderPointShadows": true, //turn off if bad FPS "showFps": true, //show fps label? },
